type.name: org.gradle.plugins.ide.eclipse.GenerateEclipseJdt
type.description:
Generates the Eclipse JDT configuration file. If you want to fine tune the eclipse configuration

At this moment nearly all configuration is done via EclipseJdt.

method.name: getJdt
method.description: Eclipse JDT model that contains information needed to generate the JDT file.

property.name: jdt
property.description: Eclipse JDT model that contains information needed to generate the JDT file.
